summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Study Buddy Clay Mask with Detoxifying Bentonite, 3 fl. oz., Exfoliates, Brightens and Clears Pores, Clay Draws Out Impurities and Improves Skin's Texture and Tone by Higher Education Skincare Review Date: 2020/08/05 Store: Higher Education Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Item Form': 'Clay', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Scent': 'Exfoliating', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.6 x 3.6 x 1.3 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381035006'} Review Text: Love this product and its unique packaging! It also came with an awesome sticker and a sample for another Higher Education Product, super impressive and fun. I love the unique packaging that looks like a book!

The clay mask itself is good quality, and dried without excessive tightening or drying. It washed off easily and definitely gave a clearer complexion. The instructions do advise to only use on t-zone if you have drier skin seasonally.

Overall, great product and I will use it weekly! Review Title: Fun and Functional Clay Mask Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mini Rubber Bands Soft Elastic Bands for Kids Hair Non-slip Rubber Hair Bands Soft Hair Elastics Ties Bands Braids Hair for Girls - STRONG - REUSEABLE (Colorful1000+Black1000) Review Date: 2020/08/05 Store: OLEWELL Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'OLEWELL', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 5 x 1 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SML'} Review Text: Cute little hair ties for the toddlers and kids in your life with thin, slippery hair! I always use this style and found this brand to be comparable to the major brand I was previously using. The stretch is good and the packet is massive, and comes with a resealable zipper pocket for each style (black and multicolour). Review Title: Solid Hair ties for your Toddlers! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Grinding Away Skin Polishing Scrub, 3 fl. oz., Polishing Scrub Works to Improve Skin's Texture and Tone by Buffing Away Dead Skin Cells by Higher Education Skincare Review Date: 2020/08/09 Store: Higher Education Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoother', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free, Cruelty Free', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 3.58 x 1.61 inches; 3 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381031008'} Review Text: This is a beautiful skin product, formulated with classical ingredients for an effective scrub, including Glycolic Acid and Vitamin E, both of which are essential for a good skin product.

The product is clear, scent-free, and works effectively to exfoliate the face without being too harsh or harmful.
I like the fun packaging, the free sticker, and the included sample for other products by Higher Education: This definitely makes me want to purchase more products, because the company goes the extra mile with their packaging and extras.

I have quite sensitive skin and this is the second Higher Education Product I've used, and both have been positive experiences. I recommend them without hesitation. Review Title: A high quality skin product that really works! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: COSMOCOS FromNature Perfect Cover BB Cream - Light Beighe/Natural Beige SPF 50+ / PA+++ Sun Protection, Natural Skin Tone, High Coverage Korean Cosmetic K Beauty - 50g (1.76 fl oz) (Light Beige) Review Date: 2020/11/19 Store: COSMOCOS Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'COSMOCOS', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.72 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Skin', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 1.5 x 1 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '364597179540'} Review Text: The FromNature Perfect Cover BB Cream is a great every day cream, I purchased it for my teen worrying it may be a little dark but it was great. BB stands for beauty blender/ing and is basically a tinted moisturizer. It works as described and isn't too thick for everyday use. Its a great price point and works great! Review Title: Good, Everyday BB Cream Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Magnetic Eyelashes With Eyeliner Kit,10 Pairs Eyelashes Magnetic 2021 Upgraded 3D Fluffy Natural Waterproof Reusable Fox Eyes Kit False Eyelashes And Eyeliner. Review Date: 2021/05/07 Store: Alyxxndra Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Color': 'Black', 'Brand': 'Alyxxndra', 'Material': 'Faux Mink', 'Material Feature': 'Disposable', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Package Dimensions': '9.21 x 6.1 x 0.71 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '788402874992', 'Manufacturer': 'Alyxxndra'} Review Text: Magnetic Lashes are probably part of the robot uprising, but I, for one, welcome our new overlords. And at least I look good while doing it.

These lashes are so great and a massive upgrade from your traditional glue on false eyelashes. I never realised how much weight the glue adds to the weight of a false lash and once I tried these magnetic lashes I was so impressed with how lightweight they are and how easily they remove. Review Title: Great New Lashes Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Cordless Water flosser for Cleaning Teeth: 3 Modes 7 nozzles, IPX7 Waterproof, 5 Hours of Charging for 50 Days, Portable Oral Rinse for Home, Travel, Braces, Bridges, Care Review Date: 2021/05/21 Store: IMTUN Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'IMTUN', 'Special Feature': 'Cordless,Portable,Waterproof', 'Product Benefits': 'Cleansing', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Use for': 'Teeth', 'Product Dimensions': '2.55 x 3.07 x 9.56 inches; 1.41 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'S1-W Tooth cleaning machine', 'UPC': '788436494609', 'Manufacturer': 'shenzhenshijiankeshiyeyouxiangongsi'} Review Text: I have wanted a water pick / water flosser for such a long time, they are a moderately expensive item for a woman on a budget and I am excited to see some off brand alternatives starting to become available. I'm not the best at dental care and I hate flossing, but I have, for a long while, wanted to find an alternative.

Like everyone should, I asked about water flossers at my last dental appointment and my dentist basically told me that while it's not as effective as traditional flossing, he still thinks its a good option particularly for lazy people like myself and those with mobility challenges who can't use floss.

The product itself is easy to use and assemble. It charges via usb which is great and convenient. I've been using it for about 2 weeks now, and I haven't had to charge it again. I probably use it for less than 2 minutes a day. My teeth do feel cleaner and I like the feeling of how the water targets in between the teeth.

I definitely recommend it! Review Title: Great Product Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Microblading Eyebrow Pen, Eyebrow Tattoo Liquid Pen (3 Pcs) , 2 in 1 Eyeliner Pencil, Waterproof brow Pen, Natural Looking, 24h Long Lasting (3 PCS - Black & Dark Brown & Light Brown) Review Date: 2021/06/28 Store: EINHOOM Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'EINHOOM', 'Item Form': 'Liquid,Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Long Lasting, Natural Looking', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '6.34 x 1.26 x 0.47 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '726312490659'} Review Text: This little eyebrow pen will give you so much control when shaping your eyebrows. It’s perfect and although I was worried the color would be too dark for my fair hair and skin, you can vary the end result dependent on the amount of pressure and product you use. Love it. Review Title: Great eyebrow tool Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. raw_response:
SUMMARY:
This individual exhibits a consistent preference for quality skincare and cosmetic products, often prioritizing brands known for their effective formulations and thoughtful packaging. Their high ratings, especially of skincare items, reveal a strong sentiment towards products that enhance skin texture and clarity, with particular favor for exfoliating and polishing benefits. 

Common themes in their purchases indicate a focus on both practical and whimsical elements, such as unique packaging and samples, suggesting a value placed on brand experience alongside product efficacy. 

Price sensitivity is evident, particularly when choosing everyday items like BB cream and dental care devices, where they appreciate budget-friendly alternatives without compromising effectiveness. With hair care products, they lean towards functional items designed for children, valuing practicality over luxury.

Overall, their core preferences center on quality, user-friendly features, unique aesthetics, and affordability. This consumer appreciates products that offer clear benefits while creating a fun or engaging experience during use, reflecting a holistic approach to personal care and grooming.

target_interaction.title: Lovely Foundation
target_interaction.text: This is a lovely foundation set in a gorgeous color - I was a bit nervous ordering the closest shade online but it worked out really well for me. I'd say it's a light coverage great for every day. It didn't wear off super easily and It washed off easily with my in shower face wash. I really recommend it.
target_interaction.title_meta: Liquid Foundation Makeup Sunscreen 2 Pcs 35ml Waterproof Oil Control Moisturizing Lightweight Non Stick Concealer Foundation for Face and Body in Glass Bottle with 2 Pcs Black Makeup Sponge
